Header.title: Pro Tutors for All Ages.
Header.paragraph: Get better grades from the first day to finals, get homework help, exam prep & writing support—tailored to your courses.

About.paragraph: At Wildcat Tutoring we care about learning, plain and simple. Individualized lessons have a much higher information retention rate than a standard classroom education, and we know that when it comes to education that one size does not fit all. Our approach includes an individualized learning plan tailored for your success, and through our extensive teaching and tutoring experience we make sure that each student gets the most out of their educational endeavors.

Services.name: Individual Sessions
Services.text: We will help you feel prepared for that next test, college interview, job promotion, TV interview, or whatever comes your way. We are prepared to help you reach your educational goals and regardless of your starting place, we're here to help you reach the finish line with a new personal best.

Services.name: Tutoring Packages
Services.text: Book a package and set yourself up for success. Our services include the One Less Thing to Worry About guarantee by providing ample reminders, session recordings, homework help, and test prep.

Testimonials.text: Victoria is an expert in Excel and tailored my tutoring sessions to my level of experience.  She has a kind demeanor and gentle teaching method and comes highly recommended.
Testimonials.name: Jill Sparks

Testimonials.text: As a prospective engineer, Mr. Robinson helped me establish a strong foundation in math, physics, and chemistry. I could always count on him and I learned so much with his help.
Testimonials.name: Chris Imasdounian

Features.title: Mathematics
Features.text: Pre-Algebra, Algebra I & II, Pre-Calculus, Trigonometry, Integrated Mathematics, Calculus, Statistics, and standardized test prep.

Features.title: Science
Features.text: Physical Science, Chemistry (all levels), Physics (all levels), Biology (all levels), Environmental Science (all levels), and standardized test prep.

Features.title: English
Features.text: Essay writing assistance, English as a second language, English Literature, and English Rhetoric.

Features.title: History & Social Sciences
Features.text: Contemporary World History, Human Geography, U.S. History, and U.S. Politics & Economics.

Features.title: Robotics & Engineering
Features.text: Robotic Design & Competition, SolidWorks, AutoCAD, PLM & PDM, Fusion360, HTML/CSS, and Javascript.

Features.title: College Prep
Features.text: Interview coaching, personal statement and scholarship essay editing, application assistance, remedial education, and SAT/ACT prep.
